p.s: The given excerpt taken from the novel Gun Love was written by Jennifer Clement and published in 2019.
The excerpt deals with the bad life situation of Helen.
On this excerpt we get a lot of information about Helen's life.
Helen is an 8 yearsyear old woman who lives actually in a foster home.
She likes to talk very much and she dodoes not realize in which conditions she lives.
Helen has two mothers ten brothers and eleven sisters.
She lives in a foster home.
She was born in a hospital.
Her brothers and sisters lives near a beach near a park.
Even she is only 8 years she has changed 17 foster home'shomes where she lived in very bad conditions.
For example she became only one square of toilet paper a day or where she only eat cereals.
She is ana very unfortunately girl because she probably never went to school and because she has very simple dreams like for example a white Christmas in Florida.
On the last part of this excerpt we know that Helen has already seventeen phones where she calls her family and where she likes to talk with her best friends Lulu, Gina and Romey.
